paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant A97S, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Cardiac involvement with heart failure symptoms.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A substantial proportion, up to 82.1% of patients with hereditary A97S ATTR amyloidosis experience cardiac involvement.

functional_data.summary: Tafamidis treatment showed subtle but statistically significant reductions in ECV, indicating a decrease in amyloid deposition.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in families as indicated by the high percentage of affected individuals.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the significant cardiac involvement in patients with the A97S variant.
key_quotes: A substantial proportion, up to 82.1% of patients with hereditary A97S ATTR amyloidosis experience cardiac involvement.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted thoroughly from the main text, focusing on the TTR gene.
